DOC.detailed_description: Recent study prove : -Garlic oil garlic may reduce platelet aggregation , patient take anticoagulant medication caution consume garlic . A 2013 meta-analysis conclude garlic preparation may effectively lower total cholesterol 11-23 mg/dL LDL cholesterol 3-15 mg/dL adult high cholesterol take longer two month . The analysis find garlic marginally positive effect HDL cholesterol , significant effect blood triglyceride level , garlic preparation generally well tolerated side effect . - Nattokinase Nattō make fermented soybean eat Japan thousand year . Nattō produce fermentation add bacterium Bacillus natto boil soybean . Nattokinase produce bacterium act soybean . While soy food contain enzyme , nattō preparation contains specific nattokinase enzyme . - Estradiol valerate one widely use ester estradiol . - Progesterone : Hormone replacement therapy .
